parameters: You enter the strange house.\! Darkness looms around the
ancient, rotting furniture.\! You feel a mysterious
Huh\..\..\..this place is giving me the creeps.\!
And why do I suddenly feel so\..\..\..different?
I get what you mean, Henriko.\. It feels as if reality
itself has changed perspectives,\. altering our
understanding of the world around us.
A large silhouette of black greets you from the shadows.\!
The aura the being exerts is intimidating,\.
yet you feel reassured by it...
Don’t you know that it’s customary to make yourself
known before entering another person’s dwelling?
I told you we should have knocked first...
I always thought it was strange how we never at least
rung a doorbell before barging into other people’s homes...
Were you born in a barn?
I-\.I'm just going to stay over here by the door until
Don’t worry about me, Henriko.\. I’m perfectly content to
be over here on the other side of the room while you
You kidding?\. I'm not goin' anywhere near tall, dark,
‘sigh’,\. I apologize for frightening you all.\! Here,\. let me
Erm\..\..\..forgive me,\. but I was expecting the shadows
I'd rather not reveal my identity to anyone at this time.
Didn’t I just say I don’t want to reveal myself?\.
It’s none of your business,\. small creature!
‘sigh’,\. if you want,\. you may refer to me as Mr. P.\.
It is a moniker I have been using during my ventures
Okay!\. It’s nice to meet you, Mr. P!
No, wait!\. Get out!\. You four are unwelcome!\. Whatever
it is you four want,\. I want nothing to do with it.\.
Get out of here before I throw you and your ridiculous
Pardon me,\. Mr. P.\. Did I mishear,\. or did you say you
began using that moniker during your adventures in
“this world?”\. What do you mean by that?
It doesn’t concern you!\. It’s my problem to deal with,
and I am perfectly capable of handling myself.
A problem?\. We can help!\. We’re good at helping people!\.
Yeah!\. We’re going to save the world!
\..\..\..you\..\..\..the Legendary Hero?\! I don’t believe that.
I’ve studied the Legends of the Hero during my time here.\.
The writings tell of a hero who will awaken during a time
of great peril to save this world.
And it just so happens that I arrive in this world during
that time of great peril to meet the Legendary Hero myself?\!
Yet it’s just as it seems.\. You must be a very lucky
My kind is normally associated with bad luck. My
appearance in places is often considered a bad omen,\.
disaster following close behind in my wake.
Besides,\. do you really expect me to believe that this
little frog here is the Legendary Hero?
What!?\. No!\. I'm not the Legendary Hero!\. They are!
The figure turns to address you,\. its glowing red eyes
staring directly at you,\. as if into your soul.
Ahem\..\..\..human!\! You really are the Legendary Hero
whose prophecies are written down in these manuscripts?
Your friends claim you are but you claim you are not?\.
Now is not the time for humility, \N[1].
I can assure you, Mr. P, they are.
I’m still skeptical.\. The writings told of a Weapon of
Legend as well.\. If you had that with you,\.
Oh!\. Show him the Sword of Divine Might,\.
Hm\..\..\..that sword does seem to match the descriptions
I've read.\. The ethereal glow around the edges really
It's good to meet you,\. \N[1],\. Hero of Legend.\.
Would you care to hear about my problem?
Yeah\..\..\..\N[1] broke it into a million pieces.
We’re searching around,\. picking up the pieces,\.
trying to put it back together again.
There was no mention of that in the legend.\!
Yet\..\..\..if what you claim is true\..\..\..perhaps you could
But I refuse to spend anymore of my time with an
uncertainty.\. Please go away.\. If you happen to repair your
Legendary Weapon,\. we can talk then.
Well,\. we don’t want to bother you anymore,\. Mr. P.\!
It was such a delight to meet you, Mr. P.\!
We’ll be on our way then.
Guess we better hit the road, guys.\. That’s our cue to leave.
But we’ll be back!\. Just you wait, Mr. P!\!
Let's start over then.\!\. My name is Mr. P.\.
Ooh!\. A detective!\. Do you wear a trench coat, carry
a magnifying glass, and solve mysteries?
No,\. sometimes,\. and yes.\. I have solved a peculiar
case or two during my time.\. But that's not important
One day,\. as I was reviewing some notes from my latest
case,\. a strange spiral portal appeared and dragged me
into an alternate dimension.\. This world I find myself
The portal disappeared before I could return to my own
world,\. so now I am lost in this odd world with no way
Interdimensional portals?\. You don't see that every day.\.
You are a very lucky individual indeed, Mr. P.\. Or perhaps,
During my time here,\. I've tried to learn all I can
about this world by reviewing the texts of the library
in Halcyon.\. That's how I learned about the Legend of
I found this abandoned shack in this town of interesting
people where I could study in peace, but I haven't had
any luck finding a solution.\. I'm afraid to show myself
to any humans,\. afraid of how they would react to me.
All I know is that I must get home.\. Back to my own world.\!

I just want to see my wife and kids again!
Kids?\. Oh my\..\..\..Mr. P, as a concerned parent myself,
I want to do everything I can to help you get back to

Speaking of things I need to do\..\..\..I believe it's time
Oh no\..\..\..but I don't want to say goodbye yet!

I had a hunch.\. There was always something about him that
So!\. We helped Mr. P!\. Or,\. uh,\. Pleasant, I guess\..\..\..
Huh?\. There's a letter on the table over here.\.
Dear \N[1],\. I don't know what you did,\.
but I'm writing this letter to thank you anyway.\. A portal
opened up in the room you're standing in now, appearing
exactly like the one that brought me to your world.
I'm not sure where it came from or why it decided to open
for me now,\. but I have a good feeling that it was you
who did this for me.\. And for that, I thank you.
I am confident that through this colorful wormhole is the
world I call my own,\. along with all the people I know
and love.\. I don't want to delay my voyage in case the
portal decides to close up before I can set foot in it.
I would have liked to thank you in person,\. but judging from
the state of the outside,\. I'm sure you and your friends
are very engaged in a battle that could decide the fate of
your world,\. so I'm writing this letter instead.
I have no doubt that together you, Henriko, \N[3], and
\N[4] will be able to save your world.\.
As for me,\. I'm certain that my family is missing me back
in my own world,\. and I don't want to keep them waiting.
May your shining sword of truth lead you to victory over all
your greatest foes in this world and the one you come from.
